description: ExternalReference is a reference to a corresponding object in another information system, for example in the German cadastre (ALKIS), the German topographic information system (ATKIS), or the OS UK MasterMap.

properties.name: targetResource
properties.description: Specifies the URI that points to the object in the external information system.

properties.name: informationSystem
properties.description: Specifies the URI that points to the external information system.

properties.name: relationType
properties.description: Specifies a URI that additionally qualifies the ExternalReference. The URI can point to a definition from an external ontology (e.g. the sameAs relation from OWL) and allows for mapping the ExternalReference to RDF triples.
